items: 10% annual same-facility growth over the past five years

items.description: We are able to structure a relationship in a way that best suits the physician, either as a partner, an affiliate or as an employed physician. We deliver strategy, resources and substantial industry knowledge.

Surgery Partners is a leading healthcare services company with an integrated outpatient delivery model. We own and operate more than 180 locations in 32 states, including surgical facilities, a diagnostic laboratory, physician practices, anesthesia services and urgent care facilities.
Our Surgery Partners team is comprised of more than 5,000 employees and 5,000 affiliated physicians, serving more than 600,000 patients annually.
